name: Mushymania
description:
Join Mushy on their quest to investigate the cause of the missing Mushlings, each sealed away in a compact disk. Can you recover all the disks, or will you fall to the many monsters that stand in your way?

All sales will go to The Trevor Project. Make sure to check out Power Up With Pride, raising money for the same cause!

Soundtrack included in download.

A game by WIZARD SCH©©L™, developers:
Hex (programming/design): Twitter @WitchsHex | itch.io
Kube (music): Twitter @ZacharyTalis | itch.io
